noun.description: Any of the regular occasions in a day when a reasonably large amount of food is eaten, such as breakfast, lunch, or dinner.

phrases: Now Tiger, I only have three hours until the nice woman from meals on wheels arrives.
They asked if I wanted someone to come, and have meals on wheels, but I'm not old.
origin: Old English melu, meolo, of Germanic origin; related to Dutch meel and German Mehl, from an Indo-European root shared by Latin molere to grind.
